HwiP_Params_t Struct Reference
HwiP OSAL Porting Layer » HwiP OSAL External Data Structures

Basic HwiP Parameters. More...

#include <drivers/osal/HwiP.h>

Data Fields

char * name
 
uintptr_t arg
 
uint32_t priority

uint8_t enableInt
 

Detailed Description

Basic HwiP Parameters.

Structure that contains the parameters passed into HwiP_create when creating a HwiP instance. The HwiP_Params_init function should be used to initialize the fields to default values before the application sets the fields manually. The HwiP default parameters are noted in HwiP_Params_init.

Field Documentation

uintptr_t HwiP_Params_t::arg

Argument passed into the Hwi function.

uint8_t HwiP_Params_t::enableInt

Flag to enable this interrupt when object is created. Default is true

char* HwiP_Params_t::name

Name of the HWI instance. Memory must persist for the life of the HWI instance. This can be used for debugging purposes, or set to NULL if not needed.

uint32_t HwiP_Params_t::priority

Device specific priority.

HwiP_Type HwiP_Params_t::type

Device specific interrupt type - FIQ, IRQ (default)
